ygData.subject: Re: Concert Hall
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The eqbards are definitely correct on this formula.  At level 43, 44, 45 my Dirge dmgs matched 311, 313, 315.  (Basically, you get 2 dmg every level after
ygData.messageBody:
> song: Denon's Desparate Dirge, Lev 43, this site says damage is
> 311+(lev-43)*2 making MAX dame at Lev 50 only 325, and does not
> say anything about mana; CH says it does 275 dam and requires
> 800mana?

The eqbards are definitely correct on this formula. At level
43, 44, 45 my Dirge dmgs matched 311, 313, 315. (Basically,
you get 2 dmg every level after you get the song - which is
what the math says) As for taking mana, I go from 5 bubbles
to less than 1 bubble, and to cast again it takes around 45
mins to 1 hour. I use Dirge a lot, and have gotten good at
moving out of range so I don't take the hit. Using it on 3
or more monsters makes it very effective. And hell, if you've
got the mana - nuke em!

Harmonic.
